description:
Kris Humphries - the NBA power forward best known for having been married to Kim Kardashian for 72 days - will make an appearance on The Mindy Project Season 2.NBC大前锋Kris Humphries，当然大家认识他是因为跟美国名媛金·卡黛珊的72天婚姻，将会客串美剧《明迪烦事多》第二季。

Details are scarce, but sources confirm to TV Guide that the new member of the Boston Celtics will play himself, similar to how Baron Davis and Amar'e Stoudemire portrayed themselves on a Season 1 episode of this Fox sitcom.目前剧组还为对外透露更多细节，不过消息人士向《电视指南》确定，这位波士顿凯尔特人队新成员将会在剧中本色出演，扮演自己，类似于这部FOX电视台喜剧第一季中Baron Davis和Amar's Stoudemire的本色出演。

Humphries joins an impressive list of Season 2 guest stars that also includes Adam Pally and James Franco. The series returns on September 17.除了Humphries以外，将会客串《明迪烦事多》的明星还有Adam Pally和James Franco。《明迪烦事多》第二季将会在美国时间9月17日首播。

title: 金•卡黛珊老公客串《明迪烦事多》
